tasks.task: Presenting and discussing grazing terminology and definitions
subtasks: Explaining management intensive grazing (SIG: MIMG)
Describing mob grazing (SIG: MG)
Detailing adaptive grazing (SIG: AG)
Differentiating rotational grazing from continuous grazing
Explaining regenerative agriculture concepts (SIG: RA)
Discussing holistic management practices (SIG: HM)
Covering various pasture management techniques (e.g., paddocks, cell grazing, bale grazing, creep grazing, leader-follower systems)
Addressing the challenges of pugging and soil compaction
Explaining grazing terminology like sward, residue, and spring flush
Clarifying animal unit concepts and calculations
Touching on marketing terms in grazing (e.g., organic, natural, grass-fed)

tasks.task: Presenting modules for future grazing terminology discussions
subtasks: Planning and scheduling future presentations on grazing terminology
Researching and collecting terms for the next presentation
